bib.title: Testing an online, dynamic consent portal for large population biobank research
bib.author: Thiel, Daniel B and Platt, Jodyn and Platt, Tevah and King, Susan B and Fisher, Nicole and Shelton, Robert and Kardia, Sharon LR
bib.abstract: Background: Michigan's BioTrust for Health, a public health research biobank comprised of residual dried bloodspot (DBS) cards from newborn screening contains over 4 million samples collected without written consent. Participant-centric initiatives are IT tools that hold
